Overview   Package  Class  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.google.gxp.compiler.alerts

Interface Summary
AlertPolicy Policy for determining the severity of Alerts.
AlertSink A "sink" for Alerts.
 

Class Summary
Alert An Alert indicates something that has (potentially) gone wrong, along with the location (if any) where it went wrong.
AlertCounter Decorator for AlertSinks that count alerts (by severity).
AlertSet A read-only set of Alerts.
AlertSetBuilder Builder for AlertSets.
ConfigurableAlertPolicy An AlertPolicy that can be configured to adjust the severity of Alerts in various ways.
DefaultAlertPolicy AlertPolicy which simply returns the Alert's default severity.
ErrorAlert An abstract Alert with a defaultSeverity of ERROR.
ErroringAlertSink An AlertSink that throws an Error if it recieves any {code Alert}s.
InfoAlert An abstract Alert with a defaultSeverity of INFO.
PrintingAlertSink An AlertSink that prints errors to an Appendable.
SourcePosition Value object for representing a position in a source file.
UniquifyingAlertSink AlertSink decorator that only alows any given alert to pass through to the delegate once.
WarningAlert An abstract Alert with a defaultSeverity of WARNING.
 

Enum Summary
Alert.Severity Variety of alert severities.
